title: Tuesday's top brokerage calls: Bajaj Finance, AU Small Finance Bank and L&T - CNBCTV18

description: Brokerage Radar: CLSA says 'sell' Bajaj Finance shares while Nomura says 'buy' Larsen and Toubro stock. Here are top brokerage calls for this morning -
